content.rendered:
TheProtectionGuru.com provides independent research and comparison of antivirus and online security software. The content published on this site, including reviews, ratings, and product comparisons, is intended for informational purposes only and should not be considered professional advice. While we strive to maintain accuracy and keep information current, we cannot guarantee that all details will remain up to date due to the fast-changing nature of the cybersecurity industry.

This site is supported through advertising partnerships. We may receive compensation from certain providers featured, which can affect the placement, prominence, and presentation of their products, including the order in which they appear or the use of promotional banners. Please note that not all antivirus solutions available on the market are represented on this site.

For objective evaluation, we recommend that readers review independent test results from organizations such as Virus Bulletin, AV-Test, and AV-Comparatives. While we may include some of these results for your convenience, product listings are not ranked solely on performance scores.

To assist in your decision-making, our comparison tools allow sorting by criteria such as Most Popular, Top Featured, and Lowest Price. “Most Popular” reflects user engagement measured by outbound clicks over the past seven days. “Top Featured” may be influenced by advertising relationships. “Lowest Price” refers to the plan we link to and may not always represent the provider’s lowest available offer.

Confidentiality and Security

By accessing and using this website, you acknowledge that TheProtectionGuru.com and its partners cannot be held liable for any issues arising from the transmission of data over the internet. Any exchange of information is undertaken at your own risk.

Contacting Us

If you have any questions, please contact us at: info@theprotectionguru.com
